author: samuraiturtle
title: Gorzan's Ride
review:
The "Legends of Chima" - "Legend Beast" series is the tribes "horses" of their world.  As the story goes the "Legend Beast" are the animals that never drank the CHI. 

The model is like "70008 Gorzan's Gorilla Striker" but smaller.  It comes with one mini-figure "Gorzan" and he comes with a hammer, a shield, and a golden mantle.  It does comes with two printed pieces the "eyes" and "mouth / nose" every thing else is a sticker.  The model does come with the new ball and socket joints.  

The model's legs do look a little small to me.  Other than that point, it is a good set at a good price.  But all the "Legend Beast" are at the same price point.
